notes.title: Expansion Opportunity
notes.content: Sarah mentioned they are planning to expand AI usage to their European operations in Q2 2025. This could represent a significant upsell opportunity. Key decision makers in EU: Hans Mueller (EU Operations Director) and Lisa Schmidt (EU IT Lead).

notes.title: Technical Integration Feedback
notes.content: Client feedback from tech team: Very satisfied with API reliability. Requested better documentation for custom webhook configurations. Emily to coordinate with docs team.

notes.title: Account Strategy Notes
notes.content:
Key account strategy for 2025:
1. Support EU expansion initiative
2. Introduce sales assist agents (Q1 pilot)
3. Achieve 40% contract value increase at renewal
4. Maintain 95%+ satisfaction score
